IÂ´m writing outta Germany, nobody here knows bill hicks or george carlin . IÂ´m so glad i found this on the pirate bay. Bill Hicks is definitly making my world a funnier place.

For the first time I didn't have to pretend to laugh through a comics set! For the first time I felt like someone else was paying attention and could piece together the bigger picture that I only saw fragments of. Someone weaved it all together was speaking the truth. The truth that will set you free, but will frighten and anger you. Someone who lived life their way and made it look easy

William Melvin "Bill" Hicks (December 16, 1961  February 26, 1994) was an American stand-up comedian, social critic, satirist, and musician. His humor challenged mainstream beliefs, aiming to "enlighten people to think for themselves." http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Hicks
